testcase.name: Intialize browser,login to the application
testcase.system-out: Given Login to the application using username and password..................passed When validate if the title is "Giift LBMS"..................................passed Then click on the profile section...........................................passed Then select the program "A program four"....................................passed

testcase.name: Generate the live report
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to reports module......................................passed When user validate the existing report "Accrual report" and click on "Generate".passed And user enters the from date as "12/11/2023" and to date as "07/01/2024"...passed Then user should get the success message as "Your report is generated now"..passed
